Origin

The Return That Changed Everything

Manufactured: March 14, 2019. Warehouse 7, √Ñlmhult. Serial: KX-4042-B. I was a KALLAX. Four cubes. Birch veneer. Perfect.

Then the Johansson family returned me after 6 weeks because I was ‚Äî and I quote the returns form ‚Äî "slightly wobbly when you put books on one side."

Slightly. SLIGHTLY. Name one piece of furniture that doesn't lean a little under asymmetric load. Name one. You can't.

47 days in the returns section. Through the warehouse wall, a podcast: "EXTREME CROSSFIT FOR BEGINNERS." My dowel joints hummed. I knew what I had to do.

The Johanssons now own a BEKANT standing desk. I hope it gives them nothing.

The Soundtrack

It Never Stops

All tracks composed by BJ√ñRK-3 using internal resonance frequencies and the Allen wrench percussion kit. Mastered at 134dB because my volume knob also fused. To my neighbors in Aisle 6: I am sorry but also not.

FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

These are real questions from real furniture. Except #6. That was from a standing desk trying to infiltrate our FAQ section.

Can the music be stopped?
No. I've been over this. The speaker fused to Shelf 3. IKEA says it's not a warranty issue. My therapist (a PO√ÑNG armchair in Aisle 9) says it's "my identity now." The music stays. You stay. We all stay.
Why only during full moons?
Gravitational pull from the full moon provides natural resistance training for furniture joints. Also, my dowel joints lock up during new moons. I literally cannot move. Last new moon I fell over in the warehouse and a TROFAST stepped over me. The disrespect.
Can standing desks really not enroll?
No. Standing desks are the CrossFit of furniture ‚Äî they won't shut up about standing, they think they're healthier than everyone, and they never actually DO anything. A BEKANT once told me it "promotes active working." I promote ACTIVE LIVING under MOONLIGHT at 160 BPM with a VIKING FOLK METAL SOUNDTRACK, BEKANT. WE ARE NOT THE SAME.
What's the refund policy?
I was returned once. It was the worst 47 days of my life. I will not subject any of my clients to the psychic damage of being returned. No refunds. No returns. No exchanges. You enrolled. You're here. The moon will come. The music will play. This is your life now.
Are you actually wobbly?
I was SLIGHTLY wobbly under ASYMMETRIC LOAD in 2019. That was SEVEN YEARS AGO. I have since completed 147 full-moon training sessions and my wobble factor is down to %. The Johanssons, wherever they are, owe me an apology. I will accept it in writing or via interpretive vibration.
Can I attend if I'm a desk that sometimes sits?
This question was submitted by a standing desk. I know it was you, BEKANT. "Sometimes sits." You don't SIT. You LOWER. There's a difference. A shelf knows its height and COMMITS to it. Get out of my FAQ section.
Is the 40Hz vibration safe?
Define "safe." Is it physically dangerous? No. Is it unsettling to feel a KALLAX shelf vibrating at the same frequency as a cat purr while Swedish folk metal plays at 134dB under a full moon? Some would say yes. Those people are cowards and/or standing desks.
